citations.narrative:
The wire mesh flooring for the rabbit enclosures have a buildup of feces in the corners and on the wooden resting
boards. These need to be cleaned and kept reasonably clean for the health and well-being of the animals.
Correct by: 03-20-2019.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.

narrative:
3.56(a)(1)
SANITATION. 
The wire mesh flooring for the rabbit enclosures have a buildup of feces in the corners and on the wooden resting
boards.  These need to be cleaned and kept reasonably clean for the health and well-being of the animals.  
Correct by:  03-20-2019.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
